org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.action

Class CustomizerActionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer.action.CustomizerActionFactory

  • public class CustomizerActionFactory
extends Object
    The CustomizerActionFactory provides default implementations of some actions which can be usefull when working with customizers. Just use the createXXXAction methods to create the Actions.
    Author:
    puce
